trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when code tries to remove a host control or Windows Forms control that was added to a document at design time.
trans-unit.target: 当代码尝试删除在设计时添加到文档的主机控件或 Windows 窗体控件时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: If you add host controls and Windows Forms controls to documents that are part of document-level customizations at design time, you cannot delete these controls at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将主机控件和 Windows 窗体控件添加到属于文档级自定义在设计时的文档中，你不能在运行时删除这些控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: This exception can be thrown by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] if you call one of the following methods to delete a control that was added at design time:
trans-unit.target: 可以引发此异常[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]如果调用以下方法之一来删除已在设计时添加的控件：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> method of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> object in a document-level customization for Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>Microsoft Office Excel 的文档级自定义项中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> method of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> object in a document-level customization for Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>Microsoft Office Word 的文档级自定义项中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The `Delete` method of a host control or Windows Forms control on a Word document or Excel workbook.
trans-unit.target: `Delete`的主机控件或 Windows 窗体控件上的 Word 文档或 Excel 工作簿的方法。
